Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an annual report to expand access to school playgrounds
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Annual report to expand access to school playgrounds.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the posting of information on the use of indoor basketball courts, and a study on improving access to indoor basketball courts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Plan to identify and facilitate the use of indoor facilities for basketball games.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an annual report to expand access to school playgrounds

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an annual report to expand access to school playgrounds

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an annual report to expand access to school playgrounds
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
